pages.text: The $(jewel)Polish Station$() is used to transform $(tool)Rough Jewels$() into finished jewels!$(br2)After creating a rough jewel at the $(l:getting_started/crafting_jewels#jewel_creation_station)Jewel Creation Station$(), bring it here to polish it into a beautiful gem ready to attach to your tools and weapons.
Craft the Polish Station to complete your jewel crafting setup.

pages.title: How to Use
pages.text: $(bold)Polishing Process:$()$(br2)1. Place a $(tool)Rough Jewel$() in the Polish Station$(br)2. The station will polish it into a finished jewel$(br)3. Take your shiny new jewel!$(br2)Now you can $(l:getting_started/attaching_jewels)attach it to your gear$() at a Smithing Table.
